1315430.name: Battlefield 4™ DMR Shortcut Kit
1315430.description:
DMRs are the perfect weapon for those who like to engage in firefights from mid-range. In Battlefield 4, you can unlock eight base-game DMRs simply by playing – but with the DMR Shortcut Kit, you'll have instant access to them right away. Whether you’re new to Battlefield 4 or just want to make up for lost time, Shortcut Kits help you go toe-to-toe with Battlefield veterans by instantly unlocking powerful gear or bonuses that would otherwise be obtained through play.

Note: this Shortcut Kit does not include any gadgets or weapons added by expansion packs.
1315430.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 捷克语, 日语*, 韩语, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 俄语*, 繁体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
